name: Dreamtest
description:
You are hungry and lost in a wood, there are others like you, what will you do? Embark on this little 5 min adventure in search of apple juice and discover the secrets of the forest on the way.

CONTROLS

-Arrow keys to move

-Space to interact

-ESC to enter menú (arros keys, space and enter to navigate menú)

I made this prototype just for fun and test some ideas in RPG MAKER, but i do plan on change and add features to make it more "RPG", any feedback is greatly apreciated!
